review: I'm slightly disappointed that the stick has to be plugged in and all the advertisements make it seem wireless. Where my tv is located the outlet is hard to reach, so sometimes it's not easy to reach.
author: S.Scott

review: I love it! It's so easy to use! I can watch Netflix or listen to pandora!
author: Rachel Reagin

review: the stick did not work for me. It did not have the power to stay connected with my router that is at the other end of our house.
author: Bob Chace

review: Got it on sail for prime members.  Works great/as expected.  Compact.  Wish it could be powered by USB- requires higher amperage.  Can't get my prime music to play.
author: Jeremy

review: When it works... it works great!  When it has connection problems... it's a nightmare.
author: Travis Hesser

review: Love it!  Love it! Love it!!!
author: Sweetbabs

review: My son wanted one of these for Christmas.  I ordered one for myself as well.  I love it.  I was previously using streaming from my laptop displaying on the TV via an HDMI cable.  Although the laptop worked great - it wasn't great when I had to get up and go pause it!I have only used it with netflix so far, but he has used hiw with Amazon Prime.
author: mdw

review: The movies I would like to see never seem to be the ones that are on the Prime list..
author: Nicole Turner

review: Easy to install and works perfectly.  Easy to follow tutorial.
author: Cindi
